actions.text: Ms. Collins (MI) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: To designate the United States Post Office located in the Tutu Park Mall in Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, as the "Earle B. Ottley United States Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the part of the facility located at 4605 Estate Tutu in Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, which houses operations of the United States Postal Service, as the Earle B. Ottley Post Office for the period it houses such operations.

titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office located in the Tutu Park Mall in Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands, as the "Earle B. Ottley United States Post Office".
